name: Exquisite Brickbreaker
description:
This is a game of brickbreaker that has an interesting choice of images for the bricks, paddle, and ball. 

Use A and D or the arrow keys to move the paddle

Press escape to exit the game

--CHANGELOG--

6/15/18

- Fixed GLFW issues (on everything BUT MacOS because Apple's stuff is always a special snowflake and YES Linux IS getting support over Mac)

6/7/18

- Fixed OpenGL compatibility issues with devices that do not support OpenGL 4.5 (especially Macs)

--OLD CHANGELOG--

- Start out with three lives

- Press space to launch ball

- Click to restart game

- Added 3 new brick life stages, including a white brick

- Made paddle smaller
